metadata.Title: CVE-2022-32213 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The llhttp parser <v14.20.1, <v16.17.1 and <v18.9.1 in the http module in Node.js does not correctly parse and validate Transfer-Encoding headers and can lead to HTTP Request Smuggling (HRS).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-32213` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnode108 - 18.13.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
nodejs - 18.13.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '18.13.0+dfsg1-1ubuntu2').
